title: Tofu (firm) Smoked paprika + cumin plate
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat the air fryer to 200°C.

Season tofu (firm) and place on the tray. Air-fry for 41 min, turning once.
Cook the spaghetti according to pack; drain well.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.

Use Spaghetti or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Bulgur wheat or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Australian Cod fillet with Sourdough bread & Carrots
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Heat walnuts in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Cook cod fillet 3–4 min until done; remove.
Stir-fry carrots and garlic with smoked paprika + cumin 16 min; season.
Return protein to warm through 1–2 min.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Swap Cod for tofu to make it vegetarian.
Use Sourdough bread or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Garlic & Peppers Baby potatoes with Black beans
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Prepare the fresh components on a board.
Mix black beans with garam masala and a pinch of salt.
Layer with garlic, peppers and baby potatoes.
Cook baby potatoes until tender (20–25 min boiled).
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Baby potatoes or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Eggs and Spinach Roast
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Toss spinach and cherry tomatoes with half the almonds, salt, pepper and cajun blend; spread on a tray.
Season eggs and place on the tray. Roast for 47 min, turning once.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Pitta or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Halloumi and Spinach Airfry
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat the air fryer to 200°C.
Toss spinach and peppers with half the butter, salt, pepper and cajun blend; spread on a tray.
Season halloumi and place on the tray. Air-fry for 31 min, turning once.
Cook the polenta according to pack; drain well.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Polenta or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Lentils and Asparagus Roast
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat the oven to 210°C.
Toss asparagus and peppers with half the tahini, salt, pepper and thai green curry paste; spread on a tray.
Season lentils and place on the tray. Roast for 24 min, turning once.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Pitta or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Eggs and Cherry tomatoes Stir-Fry
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Heat butter in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Cook eggs 6–8 min until done; remove.
Stir-fry cherry tomatoes and carrots with harissa 34 min; season.
Return protein to warm through 1–2 min.
Cook the polenta according to pack; drain well.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Polenta or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.
